episodes: 5,000+ adds from across the entirety of CBB's 8 years
anno: Yes. Seriously. Ordinarily what will appear hear is a rundown of the ~10-20 new bits from the week's new episode or something picked up during a re-listen to older content. But something big has happened here at CBB.BitMap HQ that needs some explanation ('needs'). Changes to the pricing models of a couple of platforms on which this used to be built caused a shutdown in September 2017. And a complete rewrite to both the back-end processing routines and this web app itself. And that's as good a time as any to add ~1000 instances of Fantastic; ~4700 stragglers (or Hardcastles) from episodes 1-400 (401-52x will also be reslistened-to for same); and then 311 from episodes 511-523. You'll also perhaps notice a new Browse tab; less (zero) sequestering of Location bits; and a tiny little complete fuxking overhaul.
